rows.label: bf04170150_0010
rows.name: Hey, I have a plan.

rows.label: bf04170150_0020
rows.name: Hm? What is it?

rows.label: bf04170150_0030
rows.name:
Do you mind if I stay like
this for the time being?

rows.label: bf04170150_0040
rows.name: Like this...you mean, as Hikari?

rows.label: bf04170150_0050
rows.name:
It hasn't been long since I woke up, and this is all new to you.
We need time to adjust to using my power.

rows.label: bf04170150_0060
rows.name: She and I talked it over together.

rows.label: bf04170150_0070
rows.name:
Hikari-chan's power is strong and all, 
but it must be pretty tricky to use indoors or in caves, right?

rows.label: bf04170150_0080
rows.name:
I think it'd be good to be able to 
adapt to all kinds of situations.

rows.label: bf04170150_0090
rows.name:
Absolutely, I'm totally with you on that! 
And you know, I'd really like to get to know you better too.

rows.label: bf04170150_0100
rows.name:
Wh-what's that supposed to mean?
We're still both the same inside.

rows.label: bf04170150_0110
rows.name:
You think so? 
You've got a much stronger personality though.

rows.label: bf04170150_0120
rows.name: I-it can't be helped, right? That's just my personality!

rows.label: bf04170150_0130
rows.name: You see what I mean?

rows.label: bf04170150_0140
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] ...!

rows.label: bf04170150_0150
rows.name: What's that smile for?!

rows.label: bf04170150_0160
rows.name:
No, I just thought...it's been fun lately.
A lot's happened since meeting Homura.

rows.label: bf04170150_0170
rows.name: And now I've met you too.

rows.label: bf04170150_0180
rows.name:
A lot of that stuff can't have been easy,
though. So why the smile?

rows.label: bf04170150_0190
rows.name:
Even rough patches can be valuable experiences.
Is that weird?

rows.label: bf04170150_0200
rows.name: Always the optimist.

rows.label: bf04170150_0210
rows.name:
Gramps gets mad at me for
being TOO positive sometimes...

rows.label: bf04170150_0220
rows.name: More like all the time.

rows.label: bf04170150_0230
rows.name: Ah! Was that over there?!

rows.label: bf04170150_0240
rows.name: Looks like it.
